meta.title: Get Customer Form Fields - Customer Form Fields - Customers (v3) - Store Management - API Reference
meta.description:
Returns a list of Form Field Values for the Customer or Customer Address object.

Authorization

OAuth Scopes



Headers



Example



For more informat...

blocks.data: Returns a list of [*Form Field Values*](/api-reference/customer-subscribers/customers-api-v3/models/formfieldvalue) for the [*Customer*](/api-reference/customer-subscribers/v3-customers-api/models/customer) or [*Customer Address*](/api-reference/customer-subscribers/customers-api-v3/models/address) object.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Customers | modify | `store_v2_customers` |
|  Customers | read-only | `store_v2_customers_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Client`|`client_id`|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Client: {client_id}
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Client
* **Location**: header

field_type.description:
The field type.
 * `checkboxes` - checkboxes field
 * `date` - date field
 * `multiline` - multiline text field
 * `numbers` - numbers only field
 * `password` - password field
 * `radiobuttons` - radio buttons field
 * `text` - text field
 * `picklist` - pick list field

blocks.data: The form field value was not valid. This is the result of missing required fields, or of invalid data. See the response for more details.

title.description: The error title describing the particular error.
